title: FPS Issues
body: Since 7.24 went live I have had horrible frame dropping to the point where the game is quite literally unplayable. I have tried EVERYTHING on the FPS guide Riot has and it isn't my machine seeing as how I can run Destiny 2 at 200 fps on high. Is it an issue with the patch and if so, when is the fix coming cause this is really infuriating.

replies.body: I appreciate trying all the steps in the guide, it sucks that your framerate has dropped so harshly.  :(  What OS are you running?  I'm also curious if Snowdown assets might be causing issues, what happens if you disable that via in-game options?
